description:
The defense attorney of President Gustavo Petro asked Colombia’s Congress to assume investigations into alleged irregularities in the 2022 elections. In a letter, attorney Mauricio Pava asked Congress to assume…

title: Petro wants Colombia’s election authority to stop investigating him

description:
Colombia’s war crimes tribunal JEP ordered authorities to expunge the criminal records of some 9,600 former guerrillas. The order refers to former members of the now-defunct guerrilla group FARC who…

The post Colombia’s war crimes tribunal orders expungement of former guerrillas’ criminal records appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: Colombia’s war crimes tribunal orders expungement of former guerrillas’ criminal records

description:

title: Indigenous in southwest Colombia “at imminent risk of extermination”
